üöÄ About Me

Hello! I am a first-year Mechanical Engineering student in Korea and a robotics enthusiast who loves building robots from scratch.

My ultimate goal is to become a ‚ÄòFull-Stack Robot Scientist‚Äô. Currently, I am deeply into Actuator Design & Control. I enjoy the entire process of robotics, from 3D Mechanical Design and CAE to Control Theory, Reinforcement Learning, Mathematics, and Physics.

I believe in the power of open-source. I want to contribute to the robotics community‚Äîhelping researchers, students, and hobbyists alike. That is why I share my projects as open-source resources.

I document my journey and resources on Instagram, YouTube, and GitHub to share inspiration and engage in critical discussions. I am growing every day, so please look forward to my future projects!
